Logic: LoLBin Abuse: Misusing the -urlcache flag to download arbitrary files (Ingress Tool Transfer) or -decode to obfuscate payloads. Bypasses application whitelisting.
Common False Positives: Legitimate use of certutil for certificate management.

Host/Network Artifacts: powershell.exe command contains Invoke-WebRequest, iwr, wget, curl
Logic: Download Cradle: Fetches remote payloads using aliases. Sysmon 1 captures full arguments
